com.etouch.taf.core

Class KDManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.etouch.taf.core.KDManager

  • public class KDManager
extends java.util.Observable

    A singleton class for controlling the workflow of KD Test case execution.

    Following objectives are achived

    1. Excel file is validated
    2. If there is no error then complete Excel file is read and TestSuite object with its object graph is created.
    3. In case of Error in the Format / presence of Junk char / Unmatched or incomplete DataSet and/or TestSuites - The error messages are consolidated and published in the KD Custom Report.

    Author:
    eTouch Systems Corporation

        public KDManager()

                 java.io.IOException,
                 InvalidActionException,
                 InvalidValueException,
                 DuplicateDataKeyException
        The Object of this class register the KDTestNgReporter as a listener. Everytime there is a error in validating the excel sheets, the errors are consolidated and published the in KD custom report. Reading / Validating Excel file happens at the constructor.
